channel.title: How do I make a "Starter?"
channel.description:
I can make it for mods and up but I don't know how to make it for everyone.
Also how can I make it so they can only do it once?

item.title: How do I make a "Starter?"
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

[quote=“Defiance, post:1, topic:195938”]I can make it for mods and up but I don’t know how to make it for everyone.

Also how can I make it so they can only do it once?[/quote]

To make it easier… XD

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
sendMessage(“You can make more money by PKing or monster killing.”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why do you have to be greedy?”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " is really greedy - trying to type ::starter twice!");

}

}[/code]

Change the variable by looking at tuts on how…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a "Starter?"
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

  1. Goto client.java, Search: "starter

Change && playerRights >= 1

TO:

&& playerRights >= 0
  1. Make it save the int to their file when they type it, and when they type it check if the int is 0 or 1. and then yeah.

basically:

command = starter //i kno u dont do it like that if (starter==true) { sendMessage("only once"); } else { //give starter }

Basically like that, and figure the rest out there is tutorials posted

Read full topic
